text: Mayor Lightfoot did what she had to do by removing the Christopher Columbus statue from Grant Park, but it still hurts, writes columnist @John_Kass. https://t.co/06kAB7hJBR

text: President Trump’s rhetoric about Joe Biden's housing plan is a blatant attempt to frighten homeowners with the prospect of people of color moving in, writes columnist @SteveChapman13. https://t.co/zFkI4Epc4M

text: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez has done all women a service. By refusing to ignore the unacceptable, she makes it a little easier for others to do the same, writes columnist @MarySchmich. https://t.co/AG9kRGEla0

name: chicagotribune
text: Commentary: Lack of broadband access has been a problem for far too long. Communities of color should not have to sit by idly and “wait our turn.” Our turn is now. Our quality of life depends on it. https://t.co/BbPfoIjATQ
